str2: Gilead -- a region in Palestine, also the name of several Israelites

str2: Ephraim -- a son of Joseph, also his descendants and their territory
A place or means of safety, protection
Judah -- 'praised', a son of Jacob, also the southern kingdom, also four Israelites
